message.body: I miss you! Love you! When are you coming back to mn this summer?

I miss you, sweet one! And so so so much love. I'll be home for a spell but I'll Be spending most of my time in Philly for the summer. Let's make sure to spend some good time together when I am though! Send my love to Tim. :)
Yes!!! that sounds lovely. i will send tim the love:) let me know when you decide to come home! Love love you
